text: Sébastien Neumann (born February 15, 1993) is a French baseball player currently playing for the Tigres de Toulouse in the Division Elite.2014 team roster He has also appeared in numerous international tournaments. He is playing for Team France in the 2019 European Baseball Championship. ==Division Elite career== Neumann pitched for the Cougars de Montigny in 2010 and 20112011 guide and has pitched for the Tigres de Toulouse since. ==International tournaments== The hurler played for the Under-19 French team in the 2009 Open International de Rouen.RouenBaseball76.com He played for France in the 2010 World Junior Baseball Championship and the 2011 European Junior Baseball Championship.SportingPulse.comFrenchClubs.Free.Fr He pitched for the French team in the 2012 European Under-21 Baseball Championship, winning a gold medal.Game results He represented France in the 2015 Summer Universiade. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:French baseball players Category:Living people
title: Sébastien Neumann
